itunes:title: Fake News 175 - Republicans Favored To Win Senate?
title: Fake News 175 - Republicans Favored To Win Senate?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
New FiveThirtyEight polling shows that the GOP is now favored to win the Senate as well as the House, conservative columnist George Will believes the Democrats should punt on Biden and Harris for 2024, and Elon Musk and AOC are battling on Twitter.
